text:
This information supports the information needs of financial market participants subject to Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 because
it is derived from an additional indicator related to principal adverse impacts as set out by indicator #3 in Table III of Annex I
of Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/1288 with regard to disclosure rules on sustainable investments (“Number
of days lost to injuries, accidents, fatalities or illness”).
undertaking and whether wide pay disparities exist.
